Alias.name: Stat Character
Restart statting
Alias.script:
statting = statting or {}
if statting.statting then cecho("Disabling statting script.
") disableTrigger("Statting") statting.statting = false cecho("Statting script disabled.
") else if not statting.stats then cecho("<red>Error. You have not set any minimum stats to use. Type "stat str int wil dex con" to set them, e.g. "stat 18 10 10 18 18"
") disableTrigger("Statting") statting.statting = false else enableTrigger("Statting") statting.statting = true sendAll("score", "kill sapling") end end
